CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 30, 1946, pg. 14 reads: "Sponsor First Affair - The Ivy Leaf Club of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Duquesne University, will sponsor its first affair, a Flirtation Ball, at the Kay Boys' Club, March 29. Pledgees [sic] are, left to right, standing: Shirley Jefferson, Lois Thompson (Adviser), Irene Cleveland, Bernice Carl; seated: Harriet Cucer, Lucille Stewart, Gloria Harper and Eunice Dailey. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Ivy Leaf Club of Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority, from left, standing: Shirley Jefferson, Lois Thompson (Adviser), Irene Cleveland, Bernice Carl; seated: Harriet Cucer, Lucille Stewart, Gloria Harper, and Eunice Dailey, posed in interior to plan Flirtation Ball
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Living room furniture--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority.Clubs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
